name: Wide Angle Software
overview:
Established in January 2007, Wide Angle Software is one of the leading software developers providing media management software applications to wide range of consumers all over the world.

One of the popular programs created by Wide Angle Software is Tune Sweeper, which enables users to clean up their iTunes libraries of duplicate and missing songs. Also, TouchCopy is a very popular program for Windows and Mac OSX, which can restore user’s iTunes library from their iPhone, iPod or iPad. A more recent addition to Wide Angle Software’s portfolio is iBackup Extractor, which can be used to browse and extract personal information like photos, contacts and SMS from iTunes backups.

All of Wide Angle Software’s products are available as Windows and Mac OSX free downloads, which offer limited functionality without requiring a payment or email registration. Full versions of the software give use of all of the programs’ functions as well as access to free customer support on email and online chat and free software updates.

.
